mapper.insert: Insert into study(s_title, s_type, main_language, secound_language, people_num, s_firsty, s_firstm, s_firstd, s_lasty, s_lastm, s_lastd, s_summary, s_expect, s_effect, memberid, date, date2, readcount) values(#{s_title}, #{s_type}, #{main_language}, #{secound_language}, #{people_num}, #{s_firsty}, #{s_firstm}, #{s_firstd}, #{s_lasty}, #{s_lastm}, #{s_lastd}, #{s_summary}, #{s_expect}, #{s_effect}, #{memberid}, #{date}, #{date2}, #{readcount});
mapper.select: select * from study where date2 <= now() AND s_type = 'abilityStudy';
select * from study where date2 <= now() AND s_type = 'projectStudy';
mapper.update: update study set readcount = readcount + 1 where s_num = #{s_num};
